document.full_text: a petrol bomb set off on friday by a disgruntled former employee at a rural bank in a tibetan region of northwestern china's gansu province caused 39 injuries, xinhua news agency and the local government said.
document.title: china bank bomb injures 39
lines_and_colors: a petrol bomb set off on friday by a disgruntled former employee at a rural bank in a tibetan region of northwestern china's gansu province caused 39 injuries, xinhua news agency and the local government said.
